content: The Fungiwoman's Spirit allows you to take the form of the Fungiwoman and float through the air, releasing spores as you go. These spores can potentially replenish your health as well as deal massive damage to your foes. Since you float through the air for the majority of the attack, you can also avoid taking damage from moves that can't reach you. The equipped effect increases your Health while slightly decreasing your Stamina. Depending on your style, this might be a fair exchange.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fungiwoman_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Fungiwoman Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Fungiwoman Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The Fungiwoman's Spirit allows you to take the form of the Fungiwoman and float through the air, releasing spores as you go. These spores can potentially replenish your health as well as deal massive damage to your foes. Since you float through the air for the majority of the attack, you can also avoid taking damage from moves that can't reach you. The equipped effect increases your Health while slightly decreasing your Stamina. Depending on your style, this might be a fair exchange.
